title: Little River Canyon National Preserve: Fire Management
body: Fire Management         Prescribed Fire   Prescribed Fires for Little River Canyon National Preserve   Fire management teams will implement a prescribed burn in several areas of the park each year. We will notify residents and travelers about smoke from prescribed fire project areas on this website.     Prescribed fire projects are designed to reduce wildfire risks to communities and critical resources. Smoke management is part of every prescribed fire burn plan, and efforts will be taken to reduce actual or potential smoke impacts on community areas.
